Package servlets

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    addVehicles
    This Servlet is used to request parameters from the db and use them to enter a new vehicle into the db using the online webpage
    Home
    This is the Home servlets that uses the VehicleDAO class while uses a select query to get all the vehicles assign them to the array and places them on on the Table.jsp
    Login
    This class is the servlet for the login which allows the user to login and gain access to there admin privileges ,checking that the password matches the hashed one but allows the user to enter the unhashed password.
    Logout
    Logout class removes the login session variable and redirects the user back to HOME
    ServletDelete
    The delete class takes in the ID of the vehicle and deletes it from the db.
    ServletEdit
    The edit class takes in the id but then based on the id displays all the data in the textfields from the id so you can edit it.
